name: Picture Beat Musique Mini
description:
Picture Beat Musique Mini is the free compact sized version of the full game.

“Tap, Swipe and Scribble your picture to the music”

Picture Beat Musique a 2D rhythm action game infusing original music and stylized artwork, with the X-statement; “Tap, Swipe and Scribble your picture to the music!” Players must touch the varied colored ink bubbles with their finger, using it like a paint brush, in time with the music, to release the ink onto the page. The more colored ink released onto the page, the more of the picture is painted. Players can also generate infinite amounts of gameplay by using a combination of their own music and pictures using the game‟s Mix-n-Match mode.

- 3 vibrant artistic levels, each with their own music theme.

- Play with 3 of your own music tracks, using your favourite pictures in the Mix-n-Match mode.*

- Want more? Buy the full version of Picture Beat Musique and gain experience to unlock more game features; the more you play, the more you earn.

*After selecting 3 music tracks in the Mix 'n' Match Mode no other tracks can be used. However the same 3 selected tracks can be used as many times thereafter.


The full version of Picture Beat Musique includes:

- Enjoy 11 vibrant artistic levels, each with their own music theme.

- Let the game make levels for you, using your favourite music tracks and pictures using the *Mix-n-Match mode.

- Gain experience and unlock more and more game features; the more you play, the more you earn.

*Keep Picture Beat Musique updated with the latest music analyser accuracy improvements coming soon!

*Mix 'n' Match Mode is optimised for the iPhone 4 and iPad.
